mapper.sql:
select
a.`id` as 'id', a.`rank` as 'rank', a.`is_valid` as 'isValid', a.`country_id` as 'countryId', a.`city_id` as 'cityId', a.`name` as 'name', a.`en_title` as 'enTitle', a.`address` as 'address', a.`en_address` as 'enAddress', a.`tel` as 'tel', a.`time` as 'time', a.`en_time` as 'enTime', a.`create_time` as 'createTime', a.`update_time` as 'updateTime',
from `t_store` as a
